title: Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park
description: A national park dedicated to Ghana’s first president with a mausoleum, museum, and statues.

title: Makola Market
description: A vibrant marketplace known for fabrics, goods, and fresh produce.

title: Independence Arch
description: A historic monument commemorating Ghana’s independence.

title: Labadi Beach
description: One of Accra's most popular beaches with music, horseback riding, and food vendors.

title: Accra Arts Centre
description: A hub for Ghanaian crafts, beadwork, and traditional art.

title: Osu Castle
description: A historic fort built by the Danes, once serving as the seat of government.

title: National Theatre
description: A cultural center for performing arts including plays, concerts, and dance shows.

title: W.E.B. Du Bois Centre
description: A research center and memorial for African-American scholar W.E.B. Du Bois.
